items.sentence: Tom has a brother and two sisters. His brother lives in Australia and his sisters live in New Zealand.
I wonder if there would be so many Japanese translations on this site if it were called "Por Ejemplo."
Tom was a contractor and thus did not belong to the inner-circle, even though his friend was the boss.
Tom spent fifteen minutes trying to pry open the drawer with a crowbar, but he couldn\'t get it opened.
A young boy, who couldn\'t have been more than five years old, asked Tom how to get to the post office.
